snippet: A clerical worker is back on her feet, thanks in part to The Neediest Cases Fund.
abstract: Editorial highlights case of Gladys Puglla, whose unmanageable medical bill following a stroke was drastically lowered after negotiations between the hospital and the Community Service Society, beneficiary of the New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
